item.title: Software Architecture - mind maps
item.author: Author
item.description: I started to create some minmal mind maps about Software Architecture. The current mind maps were created based on the book “Head first - software architecture”. Eventually I will later extend those. Software Architecture Roadmap You start with architectural characteristics. Then you’ll need to get the logical components, pick a style and finally document your decision. Software Architecture Mind Map Architectural Characteristics Logical Components Architectural Style Architectural Decisions MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map illustrates basic concepts Figure 1: MCP - Model Context Protocol Mind Map visualizing basic concepts
